data.name: AFL Evolution Demo
data.detailed_description:
Create your own super-star players, build your own all-star AFL team and customise the look of the game with AFL Evolution - FanHub BETA. Here you can edit your player's appearance, change their attributes to influence their skills and much more.
Customize your team’s look with over a hundred uniforms and emblems to choose from, allowing you to play in team uniforms from over 80 teams including the AFL, VFL, TAC Cup, NAB U18, as well as various bonus teams
Share your custom players and teams online and view other players and teams created by the FanHub community.
The full version of AFL Evolution - FanHub will include the ability to download your players and teams to AFL Evolution for in-game play! Coming 2017.
data.about_the_game:
Create your own super-star players, build your own all-star AFL team and customise the look of the game with AFL Evolution - FanHub BETA. Here you can edit your player's appearance, change their attributes to influence their skills and much more.
Customize your team’s look with over a hundred uniforms and emblems to choose from, allowing you to play in team uniforms from over 80 teams including the AFL, VFL, TAC Cup, NAB U18, as well as various bonus teams
Share your custom players and teams online and view other players and teams created by the FanHub community.
The full version of AFL Evolution - FanHub will include the ability to download your players and teams to AFL Evolution for in-game play! Coming 2017.
data.short_description: AFL Evolution - FanHub BETA is a player creator for AFL Evolution, coming 2017

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium Dual-Core CPU E5700 @ 3.00Ghz/AMD Athlon II X2 250 Processor 3.01Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7790 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 with minimum 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel CoreTM I3-3210 CPU @ 3.20Ghz (4 Cpus) /AMD Phenom II X4 960T 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7790 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 with minimum 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
